separateTables.name: PHONG
separateTables.label: üéüÔ∏è Ki·ªÉm tra c√°c ph√≤ng ƒëang trong th·ªùi gian check in v√† check out
separateTables.sqlBefore: SELECT dp.id AS dat_phong_id, p.so_phong, dp.trang_thai as trang_thai_dat_phong,p.trang_thai FROM CT_DATPHONG ct JOIN DATPHONG dp ON ct.datphong_id = dp.id JOIN PHONG p ON p.id = ct.phong_id WHERE GETDATE() BETWEEN dp.check_in AND dp.check_out
separateTables.sqlAfter: SELECT dp.id AS dat_phong_id, p.so_phong, dp.trang_thai as trang_thai_dat_phong,p.trang_thai FROM CT_DATPHONG ct JOIN DATPHONG dp ON ct.datphong_id = dp.id JOIN PHONG p ON p.id = ct.phong_id WHERE GETDATE() BETWEEN dp.check_in AND dp.check_out
